description: Quick caramelised onions add lots of flavour to these homemade bagels.
keywords: Bagel,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Caramelised Onion Bagels Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 red onions, peeled and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Mix the flour, sugar, salt, yeast, raisins and cinnamon in a large bowl. Make a well in the centre and pour in 300ml of warm water. Mix to form a dough.

Tip the dough on to a lightly floured work surface and knead for 6-7 minutes until stretchy and smooth. Place in an oiled bowl, cover with a damp tea towel and leave to rise for 1 hour, until doubled in size.
Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the onions for 12-15 minutes until soft and lightly caramelised.

Knock back the dough, add the caramelised onions and knead for 2-3 minutes to mix the onions in. Divide into 8 balls, make a hole in the centre of each with your finger and place on an oiled baking sheet. Cover with a damp towel and leave to rise for 30 minutes.

Bring a large pan of water to the boil and drop each bagel in, cooking for 30 seconds on each side. Remove, drain well and place on a lined baking sheet. Brush the bagels with egg yolk and bake for 15-20 minutes until golden.
